name: Coconut Sugar Body Scrub
description:
Our Coconut Sugar body scrub is 100% Organic made with coconut oil, coconut sugar, white sugar cane, Dead Sea sea salts, and Vitamin E.

It is targeted for those with exceptionally dry skin.

Aids in removal of  dead skin cells and exfoliation for absorption of vitamins to give skin a natural glow. Can be used daily without  worry of skin irritation and maintains moisture throughout the day.

17oz

name: Coconut Shea Lavender Moisturizer Bar
description:
This amazing Coconut Shea Lavender Moisturizer Bar is one of a kind. This bar is formulated for you to use either in bath or out of bath.

The Coconut Shea Lavender Moisturizer Bar is essential for those suffering with skin allergies, it helps treat sun burns, it's anti-aging, full of anti-oxidants, and vitamins A, E & D.

You can compliment this with the Coconut Sugar Scrub for amazingly soft skin.

name: Brown Sugar Scrub
description:
Our Brown Sugar Scrub is 100% Organic, made up of Almond Oil, Brown Sugar, Turbinado Sugar, Demerara Sugar and Vitamin E.

It's targeted for sensitive dry skin.

Aids in removal of dead skin cells and exfoliation for absorption of vitamins to give skin a natural glow. Can be used daily without worry of skin irritation.

17 oz

name: Cocoa Lavender Moisturizer Bar
description:
This amazing Cocoa Lavender infused Moisturizer Bar is one of a kind.  This bar is formulated for you to use either in bath or out of bath.

This Cocoa Lavender Moisturizer Bar is essential for those suffering with Eczema, it helps with the fading of stretch marks, it's anti-aging, full of anti-oxidants, and vitamins A, E & D.

You can compliment this with the Brown Sugar Scrub for amazingly soft skin.

name: Packages
description: Here you have the opportunity to select your scrub and moisturizer bar combination.
